question: In which among the following latitudes is the Sub Polar Low Pressure Belt located?
option1: 60 degree North and 60 degree South latitude
option2: 10 degree North and 10 degree South latitude
option3: 45 degree North and 45 degree South latitude
option4: 90 degree North and 90 degree South latitude
answer: 60 degree North and 60 degree South latitude
explanation: The Sub Polar Low Pressure Belt exists along 60° to 65° latitude in both the hemisphere. It is a zone of convergence of warm and cold air masses and also known as temperate convergence zone.
